level.heading: THERAPEUTIC USE OF PSYCHOTROPIC MEDICATIONS (ยง 29-6264)

level.text: If psychotropic medication is prescribed, the facility shall cooperate with the contracting entity and, where applicable, the CSSD to obtain a written report from the prescribing physician detailing:
The resident’s other medications and the effect of their interaction;
The staff monitoring requirements, if any;
The next scheduled clinical meeting; and
A current therapeutic treatment plan or behavioral management plan.

The facility shall cooperate with the contracting entity and, where applicable, the CSSD to obtain written consent from the resident’s parent(s) or guardian(s), or court order, before administering psychotropic medications.
The facility shall document the prescription and administration of medication, and notify attending physicians of, and record, significant changes in a resident’s behavior or health.
